Trinity::

she looked up at Koj,"no." was all she could say between the crying.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "RYO D" <striderzero1@h...> wrote:
> I'm in the CF Docking bay can a Bat get in there?
> 
> ::Koj::
> Stands talking to Inu-Yasha feel the peck of the bat "Feh!" Takes 
the Lance 
> in one swift movement Impales the Bat was the Tetsusaiga before it 
can 
> gather enough enegry to get any Dna Data or base data. The 
tetsusaiga drinks 
> its life force till its Bone dry. As the the bite wound 
closes. "Inu-Yasha 
> you have a mission and Stop calling me Dragon Master Koj."
> 
> ::Inu-Yasha::
> "Accept what you are Dragon Master?"
> 
> ::Koj::
> Koj watchs the Bat go Offline for good. "I need you to go hide 
yourself and 
> watch Zardus & KitKat and any other great powers on the battle 
Field record 
> the battle and bring it back."
> 
> ::Inu-Yasha::
> Enters stealth mode and carries out Koj orders. "Yes my friend."
> 
> ::Koj::
> Looks at the bat Probe "whoever sent this I bet you can hear me now 
so  Play 
> what ever games you like with the lesser maximals but cross me 
again and 
> your suffering will legendary even in HELL!" As Koj grabs the bats 
data box 
> then lets loose a furry of slash cutting the bat into mere pieces. 
Gets on 
> the Intercom: Clean up in docking bay 2 Clean up in docking bay 2. 
Koj heads 
> towards Trinitys srceams "You ok Kid."
> 
> 
>
